results.title: Tourist trap
results.creator_credit: David Schmoeller, J. Larry Carroll and Charles Band Productions
results.brief_description: Molly, it’s only a mannequin - but is it? 2 guys and 3 girls, a broken down car in a deserted backwater, and some weirdo in overalls, a ten gallon hat and rifle in hand, smells like trouble to me. It all begins with one of the guys, rolling his punctured tyre down the road to a petrol station, it seems deserted. Searching for an attendant, he becomes trapped inside a room, with a laughing mannequin in a bed, one smashing through a window, and another swaying back and forth, laughing. Quite a typical horror story, however the mannequins and their eerie qualities make this film very watchable to the bitter end.

results.title: The Elementary school = Obecna skola
results.creator_credit: Jan Sverak, Jaromir Lukas and Filmove Studio Barrandov
results.brief_description: A new teacher begins work at an elementary school in a small Czechoslovakian town closely following the second World War. This situation provides an historical backdrop for the exploration of a dark period in Czechoslovakian history. Sverak’s debut feature, written by his father (Zdenek Sverak) was the last film to represent the united Czechoslovakia, in the Foreign Language Film category of the 1991 Oscars (it lost to Italy’s entry “Mediterraneo”). Cast includes Jan Triska and Libuse Safrankova. In Czech with English subtitles.

results.title: The Real glory
results.brief_description: Set in 1906, a lonely outpost of American soldiers is left in Manila to train the Philippine Constabulary in the ways of war. They must prevent further uprisings from opposing tribes hidden in the jungle, or face continued oppression. An idealistic Doctor (Gary Cooper) clashes with the captain in charge (and the father of the woman he has fallen in love with), on how the native Moro’s can best be trained, and whether they should defend the outpost or take the battle to the jungle. As the water supply is sabotaged by the jungle tribe, the soldiers and Moros reliant on the precious water face a natural disaster as devastating as the tribal violence, cholera. Based on the novel by Charles L. Clifford. Cast includes Andrea Leeds, David Niven and Reginald Owen.

results.title: Network
results.creator_credit: Sidney Lumet, Paddy Chayefsky, Howard Gottfried and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: Sidney Lumet’s “Network” is a dead-on indictment of the TV news media which seems to be growing more relevant with each passing year. Howard Beale is the long-time news anchor for the UBS-TV News. When ratings go down, Beale is fired and suffers an on-air breakdown, announcing that he is going to commit suicide on his final programme. Ironically, his angry rantings boost his ratings - much to the surprise and delight of UBS executives. Subsequently, Beale is re-hired and re-invented as the “mad prophet of the airwaves” and soon becomes a pawn of ruthless programming executives who milk his madness for every share point it’s worth. When the “prophet” ceases to be popular and profitable however, something must be done about Beale, preferably on camera, before a live audience. Cast includes: Faye Dunaway, William Holden, Peter Finch, Robert Duvall, Wesley Addy, Beatrice Straight and Ned Beatty.

results.title: Angel of vengeance = Ms.45
results.creator_credit: Abel Ferrara, Navaron Films and Rochelle Films
results.brief_description: Abel Ferrara’s (‘Bad Lieutenant’, ‘King of New York’, ‘Driller Killer’) foray into the revenge fantasy genre is an often unnerving film which owes a lot to Roman Polanski’s disturbing tale of sexual terror, ‘Repulsion’. Set in the rough garment district of New York, ‘Angel of Vengeance’ follows the gradual descent into madness of Thana (Zoe Tamerlis), a mute seamstress who snaps after she is raped twice in one day. Her reaction to it plays like a strange form of liberation, as the once timid seamstress proceeds to off some of the more sleazier male citizens of New York city. Ferrara sprinkles this unusual and stylish low budget film with dark comic moments, eccentric characters (like Thana’s weird landlady played by Editta Sherman), and its slow motion climax is a beautiful and surreal piece of filmmaking. Cast includes Albert Sinkys, Darlene Stuto, Helen McGara, Nike Zachmanoglou.

results.title: The Opposite of sex
results.creator_credit: Don Roos, Michael Besman, David Kirkpatrick and Rysher Entertainment
results.brief_description: Christina Ricci stars as 16 year old Dedee Truitt, a teenage Lolita with a caustic tongue and scrupulous libido. ‘The Opposite of Sex’ opens with Dedee running away from her white trash mother to go and stay with her well to do gay half brother Bill (Martin Donovan), and his hunky not too bright boyfriend, Randy (William Lee Scott). Soon enough the malicious vamp has turned everyones life upside down, taking off with her brothers boyfriend and his dead ex-lovers ashes. Writer and director Don Roos has fashioned a sharp witty film which inventively uses Dedee’s voice over narration to plead her case to the audience and to confound our expectations of what she might possibly be thinking next. Ricci is wonderfully droll and jaded in the title role but not to be undone is Lisa Kudrow as the bitter and suspicious sister of Bill’s dead lover. Cast also includes Lyle Lovett, Ivan Sergei, Johnny Galecki

results.title: The River wild
results.creator_credit: Curtis Hanson, Lawrence Turman, David Foster, Turman-Foster Company and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: Meryl Street is Gail, a former rafting instructor, returning to her old river with her husband and son for her son’s birthday, and to try and salvage what is left of her marriage. On the river they meet Wade (Kevin Bacon) and Terry, two fellow rafters on their way to Bridle Creek. Halfway down the river Gail discovers Wade and Terry abandoned by their guide and offers to lead them the rest of the way. This harmless act puts all their lives in danger as Wade and Terry reveal their true, evil selves. To save her family, Gail must face her own fears and run the Gauntlet - the most dangerous of all the rapids on the river.

results.title: Mackenna's gold
results.creator_credit: J Thompson, Dimitri Tiomkin, Carl Foreman and Columbia Pictures
results.brief_description: A dying Indian entrusts sherrif Mackenna (Gregory Peck) with a map of the legendary Valley of Gold. After memorising the contents of the map Mackenna destroys it, thus placing himself in a precarious position of being a target to the local bandit gang as well as the townspeople. The two parties are united by a greed for gold and a fear of the common enemy, the Apaches. The gold in the canyon belongs to the Apaches and it has been decreed by Apache Gods that the gold remain untouched. Both those who are hunting the gold, and the Apaches who are protecting it have their own reasons behind desiring its possession, leading to a violent climax. Cast includes Gregory Peck, Omar Sharif, Telly Savalas, Burgess Meredith and Edward G Robinson. Also included on the tape are original theatrical trailers and behind the scenes information.

results.title: Killer's kiss
results.creator_credit: Stanley Kubrick, Morris Bousel, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Minotaur Productions
results.brief_description: A struggling boxer recounts how his attraction to a young woman has drawn him into a world of shadows and omnipresent violence which threatens to overwhelm him. His life becomes imperiled when he protects a nightclub dancer from her gangster boss. Although filmed in New York locations, Kubrick’s independently financed second feature has the atmosphere of a waking nightmare rather than that of realistically based drama. Cast includes Frank Silvera, Jamie Smith, Irene Kane and Ruth Sobotka.

results.title: Thunderbirds are go
results.creator_credit: David Lane, Sylvia Anderson and Associated Television (Overseas) Ltd
results.brief_description: The Tracy team launch a highly dangerous rescue mission in space in this first feature-length Thunderbirds classic. SZero X, a 21st century spacecraft, is suddenly blasted by a strange explosion as it leaves the Earth’s atmosphere bound for Mars. Is it sabotage? Can the Thunderbirds discover the perpetrators and save the next launch? This adventure film is gadget loaded and features visual effects by Derek Meddings as well as sound effects by some of London’s famous rock stars, including Cliff Richards.
